contracts.title: Procurement of Laptops and ICT Accessories
contracts.description:
Hyndburn Borough Council has undertaken a below-threshold procurement exercise via a closed tender process for the supply and delivery of laptops, accessories, and associated ICT equipment.

This opportunity was not advertised publicly and was issued directly to selected suppliers based on prior performance, availability, and suitability.

Scope of supply includes:

    40 x Lenovo ThinkPad E16 Gen 2 (i5-1335U, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD or higher)

    40 x Lenovo Universal Dock (Gen 3)

contracts.title: Cost Consultant / QS - Accrington Market Chambers
contracts.description:
Hyndburn Borough Council (HBC) is currently in the Development Phase of a round 1 application to the National Lottery Heritage Fund which will focus on the redevelopment of the 19th century listed Accrington Market Chambers (AMC) to create a new Heritage Museum, with the community, for the community.

HBC wishes to appoint a suitably qualified and highly experienced Cost Consultant/Quantity Surveyor (QS) to work with the Architect-Led Design Team, Exhibition Design Specialist, and Project Mana
contracts.cpv_description: Quantity surveying services and Contract administration services and Library, archives, museums and other cultural services

A weed spraying contract for car parks, footpaths, pedestrian areas, back streets and cycle paths in the Borough of Hyndburn which is located in the Accrington area of Lancashire. contracts.title: Hyndburn - Place Branding
contracts.description:
Introduction: Hyndburn Borough Council is seeking proposals from experienced and qualified organisations for the development of a comprehensive Place Branding and Marketing project over a period of 10 months.

The work is to include the production of marketing materials, such as print, in-line with the scope of the project.

The project aims to create a strong and cohesive brand identity for Accrington, that would be then utilised across the borough. The branding would resonate with Hyndburn

contracts.title: The provision of grave digging for weekends and bank holidays
contracts.description:
Hyndburn Borough Council is looking for an experienced and skilled contractor to provide a grave digging service at weekends and bank holidays. Hyndburn Council would like to build capacity so it can have a more flexible approach to burials, so customers can have the choice to be buried at weekends and on bank holidays and it caters for short notice burials at weekends and bank holidays. 

The Council is seeking a contractor able to undertake grave digging operations for weekends and bank holi

contracts.title: Knuzden Play Area installation and new ballcourt installation for Hyndburn Borough Council
contracts.description:
Groundworks to include the provision of a tarmac surface suitable for a ballcourt playing surface including the installation of a ballcourt. Also the installation of children's playground equipment within a tarmac area including fencing and gates. A tarmac link path is also required for access to the proposed play area and ballcourt.

Return tenders by post following the details in the letter and tender documents.

contracts.description:
Groundworks to involve clearance of scrub, relevelling and the provision of a tarmac surface suitable for a ballcourt playing surface. Clean stone drainage around the newly laid playing surface. A element of cut and fill is required.

contracts.title: Design and provision of a pump track at Milnshaw Park, Accrington for Hyndburn Borough Council
contracts.description:
Design and build a pump track for wheeled sports as per a design brief. This is a design competition and the winning tenderer will be evaluated on their submitted design against the design brief by a pre-selected panel with an interest in this project. 

Please submit your proposal using a 2 envelope system as described in the invitation to tender letter. Please send supporting information to help assess the design proposal with the tender by the closing date 2:00pm 15th, March 2021.
contracts.cpv_description: Park and playground equipment and Cycle path construction work

contracts.title: Access improvements to Peel Park LNR
contracts.description: Access improvements including steps, ramps, paths, handrails and stone retaining walls. The existing area is predominantly bramble and requires clearing in advance. The area is sloping hence the need for steps and ramps.
contracts.cpv_description: Landscaping work for green areas and Footpath construction work

Paving and resurfacing works in a public open space in the town of Great Harwood, Lancashire.

As some work is on the public highway the tenderer should be approved by a highways authority for street works.

contracts.title: Open Space Audit for the Hyndburn Local Plan
contracts.description: Hyndburn Borough Council ("the Council") is preparing a new Local Plan, including strategic policies and site allocations. To inform the Local Plan, the Council is seeking to appoint suitably qualified consultants to undertake a comprehensive Open Space Audit (OSA), assessing the quantity, accessibility and quality of a range of open space typologies across the Borough.
contracts.cpv_description: Research and development services and related consultancy services

contracts.title: Highways Capacity Study - Hyndburn Local Plan 2036
contracts.description:
Hyndburn Borough Council is seeking to appoint experienced consultants to prepare a Highways Capacity Study to inform the preparation of the emerging Hyndburn Local Plan, in particular the Strategic Policies and Site Allocations Development Plan Document (DPD).

The study should include an assessment of existing highway capacity in the Council area and the potential impact on highway capacity of new housing and employment development identified in the Local Plan, highlighting where and when pa
contracts.cpv_description: Research and development services and related consultancy services

contracts.title: Rhyddings Park Coach House and Kitchen Garden
contracts.description: Demolition of existing service building and re-construction to new footprint. Renovation of existing coach house and construction of new two storey extension. Re-building of existing external boundary wall including gates and fencing, construction of new period style greenhouse. Construction of planter beds and footpaths within renovated kitchen garden area. Including drainage and services.

contracts.title: Football Cages Bank Mill Fields, Great Harwood
contracts.description:
The works comprise grading and levelling works to an area of land currently set out as amenity grass land to enable the construction of 3no 3G football cages designed for small sided football.

Works include construction of pitch surface, installation of sports grade rebound fencing with gates, floodlighting and associated service connections, footpath links, drainage and hard and soft landscaping to facilitate access and egress to the site.
contracts.cpv_description: Landscaping work for sports grounds and recreational areas and Works for complete or part construction and civil engineering work

contracts.title: Rhyddings Park Heritage Landscape, Oswaldtwistle
contracts.description: As part of the regeneration of Rhyddings Park in Oswaldtwistle (which includes wider heritage improvements), this opportunity comprises path re-surfacing, upgrading and creation of new paths; creation of several new park features including an amphitheatre, regenerated parterre garden, orchard and car parking facilities. Soft landscaping works include rhododendron and selected tree removal, grass and turf areas, creation of wild flower glades and an improvement to the rockery and woodland underst
